doctor.name: Dr. Satyajit Dhar
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS, MD, FIPM (India), Pain Management Training (Thailand)
doctor.info: Dr. Satyajit Dhar is a Anesthesiologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS, MD, FIPM (India), Pain Management Training (Thailand). He is a Associate Professor, Anesthesiology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Epic Healthcare, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Satyajit Dhar at Epic Healthcare, Chittagong is 7.30pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 19, K.B. Fazlul Kader Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mohammad Harun Or Roshid
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Mohammad Harun Or Roshid is a Anesthesiologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, DA, MD (Anesthesiology). He is a Professor & Head of the Department of Anesthesiology & ICU at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Mohammad Harun Or Roshid at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Rajdeep Biswas
doctor.info: Dr. Rajdeep Biswas is an experienced medicine and intensive care unit (ICU) specialist in Chattogram, holding qualifications including MBBS (DMC), MRCP (London, UK), MACP (USA), and DA. He currently serves as a Consultant in the Intensive Care Unit (ICU) at the 250 Bedded General Hospital, Chattogram. Dr. Biswas specializes in managing critical and emergency conditions such as sepsis, respiratory failure, heart failure, stroke, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), pneumonia, and multi-organ dysfunction syndrome (MODS). He offers patient consultations at Epic Healthcare Ltd. (Andarkilla Branch), located before the City Corporation Office, Andarkilla, Chattogram, from 7pm to 9.30pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Before City Corporation Office, Andarkilla, Chattogram
